item.title: Combine Ran Into a Hiccup Today
item.description: A look at today’s unexpected issue with the combine, showing how we troubleshoot and resolve problems to keep the harvest moving smoothly.

item.title: A Dangerous Job on the Farm
item.description: Go behind the scenes of a risky farm task, highlighting the safety challenges and precautions needed to manage dangerous work in agriculture.

item.title: Dumping the Silage Wagon Isn’t As Easy As It Looks
